text: == Events == * September 11 – Battle of Zenta, Prince Eugene of Savoy beat the Ottoman army of Mustafa II * September 20 – The Treaty of Ryswick * December 2 – St Paul's Cathedral opened in London * Peter the Great travels in Europe officially with a false identity as "artilleryman Pjotr Mikhailov" * Use of palanquins increases in Europe * Christopher Polhem starts Sweden's first technical school. * The royal castle "Tre Kronor" in Stockholm burns to the ground. A large portion of the royal library is destroyed. * Karl XII of Sweden is made king at the age of 15. * Tayasal, capital of the Peten Itza Maya, the last Mesoamerican state which ruled itself, is taken over by Spain * The Manchu Empire takes over western Mongolia
